title: MapAgorg Dashboard
text:
This dashboard visualizes the geography of civic infrastructure and opportunity in the United States.



Mapping the Modern Agora: SNF Agora Institute, Johns Hopkins University
“The Unequal Landscape of Civic Opportunity in America.” (Milan de Vries, Jae Yeon Kim, and Hahrie Han) Nature Human Behaviour, Online First in November 2023 [replication] [supplementary materials] [preprint]

title: MapAgorg Dashboard
text:
Mapping the Modern Agora: SNF Agora Institute, Johns Hopkins University
“The Unequal Landscape of Civic Opportunity in America.” (Milan de Vries, Jae Yeon Kim, and Hahrie Han) Nature Human Behaviour, Online First in November 2023 [replication] [supplementary materials] [preprint]

title: About
text:
This dashboard is powered by the MapAgora datasets, derived from IRS tax returns of tax-exempt organizations and their websites.

Developer and maintainer: Jae Yeon Kim and Milan de Vries
